title: Encore: Long Hair and the Waterfall (feat. Rosalind Chao)
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Recorded live at Tanglewood with members of the Boston Symphony Orchestra and an all-star cast, this Korean tale offers an enchanting explanation to why cats and dogs don’t get along.
